snippet.title: Holomento Trailer (Steam)
snippet.description: Holomento is an indie permadeath RPG focusing on the dangerous quest of passing through the mysterious Eventide Hollow - and rebuilding it step by step. It is heavily inspired by classics such as Zelda and Terranigma, combined with rogue-lite elements.

localized.title: Holomento Trailer (Steam)
localized.description: Holomento is an indie permadeath RPG focusing on the dangerous quest of passing through the mysterious Eventide Hollow - and rebuilding it step by step. It is heavily inspired by classics such as Zelda and Terranigma, combined with rogue-lite elements.
